授業方法:
This course will be conducted mainly face-to-face, but some of the classes will be conducted online (simultaneous or on demand), depending on the pace of the course. 

General course format: This is NOT a lecture class. Lessons are highly student-centered involving pair work, group work, and workshopping. Students are expected to actively contribute to class discussions and respond to other students, including making comments and asking questions. They are also expected to complete their assignments in a timely manner before each class.

第1回: Classroom introduction, overview of creative writing
第7回:
Short story review 
Original short story due
第12回:
Writing poetry with rhymes 
Original poem due
